description: Listed building consent for Existing courtyard and kitchen of No.2 to merge into No.1 with a privacy screen between two properties. Single storey rear extension, first floor rear extension and the installation of PV panels to No. 1. First floor rear extension to No. 2. New rooflights for both properties. (Listed Building)
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: 81023-10-P, 81023-100-P, 81023-101-P, 81023-102-P, 81023-103-P, Heritage Statement, Flood Risk Assessment Report Received: 5/1/2024
Planning Design and Access Statement I and II, Construction Logistics Plan and Planning Fire Safety Strategy. Received: 2/2/2024
81023-200-P1, 81023-201-P1, 81023-202-P1 and 81023-203-P1. Received: 28/3/2024

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building, unless otherwise shown on the approved plans.
Condition : 4 - The windows to be fitted on the rear roof face of the dwellings shall be black-framed and traditional, conservation-style.
